name: Eliza (Blackbunny404)
description:
Eliza is a game about Jared and his journey to find his missing girlfriend Eliza in the strange world of black and white. The game was basically made for B&W game jam, it's a game jam for black and white game theme, no wonder why the whole game is actually in grayscale.

Features

  •  A 6 stage of platforms / puzzle
  • Each represent 6 stories
  •  6 stories 1 nightmare
  • Horror atmospheres
  • Easter eggs and clues inside and outside

Developer's note

Eliza is just a demo right now, I will continue to finish it after the game jam ends. While I work on the full game, you can enjoy by finding the Easter eggs and clues in-game and more. I'd love to see some feedbacks from you!

Now if you excuse me, I'm just gonna just play my Beatles Spotify playlist now.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
